description: Detects the use of Jlaive to execute assemblies in a copied PowerShell
author: Jose Luis Sanchez Martinez (@Joseliyo_Jstnk)
name: HackTool - Jlaive In-Memory Assembly Execution
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe" AND process.parent.command_line.text:"*.bat") AND (((process.executable.text:"*\\xcopy.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*powershell.exe*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.bat.exe*")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\xcopy.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*pwsh.exe*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.bat.exe*")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\attrib.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*\+s*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\+h*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.bat.exe*"))))
